multiscandllib.scripts package¶

Submodules¶

multiscandllib.scripts.example_template module¶

Example using:

  • custom_model_01: 7 blocks of Conv2D+BN+GN+MP

  • dataset using 12 views (24 layers of depth)

  • number of classes is 3

  • batch ize is 64

  • number of epochs is 10.

multiscandllib.scripts.example_3_classes.main()¶

Main function.

Example using:

  • custom_model_01: 7 blocks of Conv2D+BN+GN+MP

  • dataset using 12 views (24 layers of depth)

  • number of classes is 3

  • batch ize is 64

  • number of epochs is 10.

multiscandllib.scripts.parallel_example_3_classes module¶

Example using:

  • custom_model_01: 7 blocks of Conv2D+BN+GN+MP

  • dataset using 12 views (24 layers of depth)

  • number of CLASSES is 3

  • batch ize is 64

  • number of epochs is 10.

Date: 20190531

Class Data Generator for Keras.

multiscandllib.scripts.self_contained_script.get_model(input_shape: Tuple[int, int, int], classes: int) → keras.models.Sequential¶

Custom model form by 7 blocks. Each block contains:

  • Conv2D

  • BatchNormalization

  • GaussianNoise

  • MaxPooling2D

Followed by the classification block.

Main function.
